title: Coach Me: Complete Books 1-4
description: Tom Jensen's the star football player at Santa Clara High. He's dating Cindy, the gorgeous cheerleader, and is absolutely straight. Or that's what he's always thought.But when he's late to practice for the third time, Coach Robbins offers him an alternative to detention that makes Tom question just how straight he is.This complete collection of the Coach Me Series consists of: Coach Me, Take Me, Bed Me and Be With Me. That's over 20000 words of HOT M/M erotica that's strictly for over 18s only.
author: Cat Summerfield
